title: Cost center workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of a cost center record.

The cost center workflow relies on business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field influenced by a business rule during that phase. For more information about the out-of-the-box business rules defined for the cost center workflow, see Cost center process - Business rules.

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual

The cost center is available for selection.

To make the cost center inactive, manually transition it to the Inactive phase.

Next phase: Inactive

Metaphase: Inactive (End)

Phase Transition Description
Inactive Manual

The cost center isn't available for selection.

To make the cost center active again, manually transition it to the Active phase.

Next phase: None, or return to Active
